skills.title: Front-end Development (React)
skills.description: Develops interactive and dynamic user interfaces using React, ensuring a seamless and engaging experience for website visitors.

skills.title: Back-end Development (MERN)
skills.description: Manages server-side operations with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, ensuring data integrity and overall application functionality.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Strives to optimize user experience by conducting thorough research, creating insightful wireframes, and designing visually appealing interfaces.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Utilizes Webflow for visually creating responsive websites, combining design and development seamlessly to streamline the web development process.

portfolio.title: Online Medical Store
portfolio.description: Successfully developed a sophisticated online medical store using a tech stack of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Meticulously designed a user-friendly interface that boasts a comprehensive catalog of medical supplies and health-related products, ensuring an engaging and informative browsing experience. Incorporated a robust JSON server to provide efficient backend support and seamless data management, thereby optimizing the overall functionality and responsiveness of the platform.

portfolio.title: Nykaa online shopping website
portfolio.description: Developed a feature-rich dynamic shopping cart, empowering users to effortlessly add products, review selections, and securely proceed to checkout. Implemented local storage functionality to ensure a secure and persistent shopping experience, allowing users to conveniently resume their shopping sessions. The system prioritizes thoughtful architecture, user-friendly navigation, and optimized product cards/pages, enhancing the overall shopping experience with filters and a streamlined checkout process.

portfolio.title: Wine Store - E-COMMERCE
portfolio.description: Developed MineWine, an online wine store using React. Enables customers to explore diverse wine regions, varieties, and producers. The platform offers a broad selection, from rare to everyday wines, sourced directly from wineries and distributors. Emphasized thoughtful architecture, easy navigation, and optimized product cards/pages for a seamless shopping experience, including filters and a straightforward checkout process. including filters and a straightforward checkout process.

testimonial.description: Your work showcases impressive technical skills. The way you've implemented advanced features and also the integrated cutting-edge technologies is truly commendable. All the best for future
Your understanding of user needs shines through in your portfolio. The user-friendly interfaces and detailed product catalogs showcase your talent for creating engaging and intuitive designs.
